get.summary: Gets uncompleted tasks of the authenticated user
get.description:
This returns uncompleted tasks of the authenticated user in the following cases:
  • The authenticated is the creator of the task
  • The authenticated is the assignee of the task
  • The authenticated is a coworker of the task

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Type of task to get (all, incoming, overdue)

parameters.name: returnSize
parameters.description: Returning the number of tasks or not

post.summary: Clones a specific task by id
post.description: This clones the task if the authenticated user has permissions to edit the objects linked to this task.
